Dear Mridul,




Good day to you.




I hope this email finds you well. Please find attached the quotation for the Seres EV brand. We would appreciate it if you could provide us with an insurance quote for these vehicles, as we currently have two clients interested in leasing them.




Please let me know if you require any additional information or specifications to prepare the quote.




Thank you for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.


Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental

 <https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1-Ddizmpxe9_kDi6uzmzWJjHqGqyKkU0f&export=download>

Dubai Design District
Dubai, UAE

Dear Mridul,

 

Good day to you.

 

I hope this email finds you well. Please find attached the quotation for the Seres EV brand. We would appreciate it if you could provide us with an insurance quote for these vehicles, as we currently have two clients interested in leasing them.

 

Please let me know if you require any additional information or specifications to prepare the quote.

 

Thank you for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

 

Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 

EV Leasing & Rental

+971 58 541 4500
